ModMetaData.name: Biodiversity
ModMetaData.author: Igabod
ModMetaData.description:
Adds some friendly and not so friendly animals that wander around inviting your colonists to shoot them.
Credits due to:
Shinzy for the textures for Crashbug, Furx, Lacosdile, Megaslug, Rim Ram, Spindlecrib, and Snork. Pidggit for the textures for the Rimdog and Rimwolf. Haplo for the .dll and XML to make animals aggressive. Kirid for allowing me to include his Alpha Muffalos. As well as flies, mosquitos, and tarantulas. Giraffe for suggesting the Quadhog and my friend Ellie for naming it. Neocryptorian for assisting with updating to alpha 10f.
